member.name: T:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask
member.summary: Generates a Windows Forms Control that wraps ActiveX Controls defined in an OCX.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Import the ActiveX control.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.NeedsCompiling
member.summary: Determines whether the assembly needs to be created again.
member.returns: if the assembly needs to be created again; otherwise, .

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.OcxFile
member.summary: Filename of the .ocx file.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.OutputFile
member.summary: Filename of the generated assembly.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.PublicKeyFile
member.summary: Specifies the file containing the public key to use to sign the resulting assembly.
member.value: The file containing the public key to use to sign the resulting assembly.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.KeyFile
member.summary: Specifies the publisher's official public/private key pair with which the resulting assembly should be signed with a strong name.
member.value: The keyfile to use to sign the resulting assembly with a strong name.

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.KeyContainer
member.summary: Specifies the key container in which the public/private key pair should be found that should be used to sign the resulting assembly with a strong name.
member.value: The key container containing a public/private key pair that should be used to sign the resulting assembly.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.DelaySign
member.summary: Specifies to sign the resulting control using delayed signing.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.GenerateSource
member.summary: Determines whether C# source code for the Windows Form wrapper should be generated. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.RcwFile
member.summary: Assembly to use for Runtime Callable Wrapper rather than generating new one. Only supported on .NET 1.1 or higher.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.AxImpTask.ProgramArguments
member.summary: Gets the command-line arguments for the external program.
member.value: The command-line arguments for the external program.

member.name: T:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.ReadRegistryTask
member.summary: Reads a value or set of values from the Windows Registry into one or more NAnt properties.

example.para: Read a single value from the registry.
Read all the registry values in a key.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.ReadRegistryTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: read the specified registry value

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.ReadRegistryTask.LookupRegKey(System.String,Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive[])
member.summary: Returns the hive for a given key.
member.returns: The hive for a given key.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.ReadRegistryTask.GetHiveKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive)
member.summary: Returns the key for a given registry hive.
member.param: The registry hive to return the key for.
member.returns: The key for a given registry hive.

summary.para: The property to set to the specified registry key value.
If this attribute is used then a single value will be read.
The prefix to use for the specified registry key values.
If this attribute is used then all registry values will be read and stored as properties with this prefix.

example.para: Registry values a, b, c will be turned into prefixa, prefixb, prefixc named properties

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.ReadRegistryTask.RegistryKey
member.summary: The registry key to read, including the path.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.ReadRegistryTask.RegistryHiveName
member.summary: Space separated list of registry hives to search for . For a list of possible values, see . The default is .

member.name: T:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbExpTask
member.summary: Exports a .NET assembly to a type library that can be used from unmanaged code (wraps Microsoft's tlbexp.exe).

para.see: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbExpTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Exports the type library.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbExpTask.NeedsCompiling
member.summary: Determines whether the assembly needs to be exported to a type library again.
member.returns: if the assembly needs to be exported to a type library; otherwise, .

member.value: The assembly for which to export a type library.

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: T:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbImpTask
member.summary: Imports a type library to a .NET assembly (wraps Microsoft's tlbimp.exe).

remarks.para: This task lets you easily create interop assemblies. By default, it will not reimport if the underlying COM TypeLib or reference has not changed.

para.see: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbImpTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Imports the type library to a .NET assembly.

member.name: M:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbImpTask.NeedsCompiling
member.summary: Determines whether the type library needs to be imported again.
member.returns: if the type library needs to be imported; otherwise, .

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbImpTask.OutputFile
member.summary: Specifies the name of the output file.
member.value: The name of the output file.

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbImpTask.Namespace
member.summary: Specifies the namespace in which to produce the assembly.
member.value: The namespace in which to produce the assembly.

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.Win32.Tasks.TlbImpTask.AsmVersion
member.summary: Specifies the version number of the assembly to produce.

remarks.value: The version number of the assembly to produce.
remarks.para: The version number should be in the format major.minor.build.revision.

para.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.
